        <script><![CDATA[var grpMem = []; //fetching the groups the logged in user is part of
var loggedInUsrType = []; // fetching owning business group the logged in user is part of 
var typeID = [];

var usr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
if (usr.get('be4fb2f81b627510ff37eb14b24bcb65')) {
    loggedInUsrType.push(usr.u_associated_business_markets);
    gs.info('Logged in user associated markets ' + loggedInUsrType.toString());
}

var grpType = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group_type');
grpType.addEncodedQuery('nameIN' + loggedInUsrType.toString());
grpType.query();
while(grpType.next()){
	typeID.push(grpType.getUniqueValue());
}

gs.info('Sys ID of the logged in user associated markets ' + typeID.toString());



var myGroups = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember'); //group.typeLIKE507da7541b547d106ed00e1ad34bcbc8^ORgroup.typeLIKEfd8d2b541b547d106ed00e1ad34bcb9f
myGroups.addEncodedQuery('group.typeIN' + typeID.toString()); //fetching the logged in user unique value user=be4fb2f81b627510ff37eb14b24bcb65^group.typeLIKE
myGroups.query();
while (myGroups.next()) {
    grpMem.push(myGroups.group.sys_id); //appending the groups wwhich logged in user has access to grpMem array
}
gs.info(' List of groups with the associated markets: ' + grpMem.toString());
